entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:20 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 05:52 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -19.3°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -22.5°C
Wind: WNW 15 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
